max-count.description: The maximum number of images to select

width.description: The width of the image preview area and the Add Image button, in rpx, cannot be a percentage, or auto
width.description_zh: 图片预览区域和添加图片按钮的宽度，单位rpx，不能是百分比，或者auto

height.description: The height of the image preview area and the Add Image button, in rpx, cannot be a percentage, or auto
height.description_zh: 图片预览区域和添加图片按钮的高度，单位rpx，不能是百分比，或者auto

custom-btn.description: If you want to customize the button to select an image, set it to true
custom-btn.description_zh: 如果需要自定义选择图片的按钮，设置为true

show-progress.description: Whether or not to display a progress bar

disabled.description_zh: 是否启用(显示/隐藏)组件

image-mode.description: Preview the image display mode, and the optional value is the mode attribute value of the image of uni
image-mode.description_zh: 预览图片等显示模式，可选值为uni的image的mode属性值

header.description: Upload the carrying header information, object form
header.description_zh: 上传携带的头信息，对象形式

name.description: Upload the field name of the file for the backend to use
name.description_zh: 上传文件的字段名，供后端获取使用

size-type.description: original 原图，compressed 压缩图，默认二者都有，H5无效
size-type.description_zh: original 原图，compressed 压缩图，默认二者都有，H5无效

source-type.description: Select the source of the image, album - select the image from the album, camera - use the camera, and both are the default
source-type.description_zh: 选择图片的来源，album-从相册选图，camera-使用相机，默认二者都有

preview-full-image.description: Is it possible to preview the selected picture via uni.previewImage?
preview-full-image.description_zh: 是否可以通过uni.previewImage预览已选择的图片

multiple.description: Whether to enable multi-selection of images is not supported on some Android models
multiple.description_zh: 是否开启图片多选，部分安卓机型不支持

deletable.description: Whether to display a button to delete the image
deletable.description_zh: 是否显示删除图片的按钮

max-size.description: Select the maximum size of a single file, which is not limited by default
max-size.description_zh: 选择单个文件的最大大小，单位B(byte)，默认不限制

:file-list.description: The default display of the image list, the array element is an object, and the URL attribute must be provided
:file-list.description_zh: 默认显示的图片列表，数组元素为对象，必须提供url属性

upload-text.description: Select the tooltip text for the image button
upload-text.description_zh: 选择图片按钮的提示文字

auto-upload.description: After selecting whether the image will be automatically uploaded, see the instructions above
auto-upload.description_zh: 选择完图片是否自动上传，见上方说明

show-tips.description: Whether toasts are automatically prompted under special circumstances are explained above
show-tips.description_zh: 特殊情况下是否自动提示toast，见上方说明

show-upload-list.description: Whether to display a preview of the image inside the portlet
show-upload-list.description_zh: 是否显示组件内部的图片预览

del-icon.description: Delete the icon name in the upper right corner, and only the built-in icon can be uView
del-icon.description_zh: 右上角删除图标名称，只能为uView内置图标

del-bg-color.description: The background color of the close button in the upper right corner
del-bg-color.description_zh: 右上角关闭按钮的背景颜色

del-color.description: The color of the button icon in the upper right corner
del-color.description_zh: 右上角关闭按钮图标的颜色

to-json.description: If the value returned by the server is a JSON string after uploading, whether it will be automatically converted to JSON
to-json.description_zh: 如果上传后服务端返回的值为json字符串的话，是否自动转为json

before-upload.description: The hook callback function that is triggered before each file is uploaded is described above, be careful not to add parentheses
before-upload.description_zh: 每个文件上传前触发的钩子回调函数，见上方说明，注意不要加括号

index.description: The last parameter in each callback event is returned to distinguish which component's event it is
index.description_zh: 在各个回调事件中的最后一个参数返回，用于区别是哪一个组件的事件

methods.name: upload
methods.description: Call this method to manually upload an image
methods.description_zh: 调用此方法，手动上传图片

methods.name: clear
methods.description: Call this method to empty the list of internal files
methods.description_zh: 调用此方法，清空内部文件列表

methods.name: reUpload
methods.description: Call this method to re-upload images that failed to be uploaded internally or have not yet been uploaded
methods.description_zh: 调用此方法，重新上传内部上传失败或者尚未上传的图片

methods.name: remove
methods.description: Manually remove an image from a list, and the index is the index of the lists array
methods.description_zh: 手动移除列表的某一个图片，index为lists数组的索引

slots.name: addBtn
slots.description_zh: 自定义的选择图片按钮
